name: Panel Upgrades & Modernization
description: Upgrade your outdated electrical panel to handle modern power demands safely. We replace obsolete panels with code-compliant systems featuring increased capacity (200A+), whole-home surge protection, and future-proof infrastructure for EVs, smart homes, and high-power appliances.
shortDescription: Modernize your electrical panel for safety and increased capacity
features: Replacement of hazardous brands (Federal Pacific, Zinsco)
Future-ready for EV chargers and solar
